body.para: On Mon, Oct 04, 1999 at 05:20:10PM -0400, Matthew J. Sullivan wrote:

quote.quotepara: I own a USB CD-RW and was wondering if there is any chance I might be able to get it working under 2.3.x. I've downloaded the latest experimental kernel and have been playing with it to no avail. Does anybody have any pointers for me? -Matt

body.para: Matt, if you follow the suggestions in the other reply to this note, please be sure to include the name/model of the usb/cd-rw drive, since I'm about to buy one. If yours works, I'll buy the same.
